All functions

clean_digits()

Clean the digits in a data frame

cv_partition()

Creating CV data partition

plot_RLE()

RLE plot

print(<cv_obj>)

Printing cv_partition object

rf_cv_multi() rf_cv()

Performing CV using random forest, allowing multiple cores

str_sub_front_last()

Substring based on number of first and last characters

v2df() t2df()

Convert a named vector into a data.frame

top()

Display the first k rows and first k columns of the data
